name: Endless Wizard
description:
Endless Wizard is an Endless Runner made for Global Game Jam 2020.

After an unfortunate self-casting of a Hover spell, this junior wizard cannot slow himself down, and he's stuck in the old and broken basement! Use your healing spells to fix the broken scenery before you get hurt! How to play: Use the mouse to aim, and click to sling a spell at floorboards, chandeliers, etc.

Credits:

Programming:

- Cody Selman

- Arlie Brown

- Caio Servija

Art: Mike Swarts

Music: Giovanni Negron
